subject: EVPmaker thought--question.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Wonder if it's possible to do a droid app to run EVPmaker on the android
phone or an iphone. I think it's time to move this audio ITC in a more
better direction. The boxes work, but the problems, like no signals in rural
areas, noise, static and highly distorted audio make it poor at best. With
practice you can get two way commo.  I think it's best to record with
EVPmaker and the boxes. Then listen.

 Frank-S
